# SCNChamferMode.back

**Case**

Apply a chamfer to only the back edge of the extruded shape.

## Declaration

```swift
case back
```

## Constants

- **SCNChamferMode.both**: Apply a chamfer to both front and back edges of the extruded shape.
- **SCNChamferMode.front**: Apply a chamfer to only the front edge of the extruded shape.

items.description: Apply a chamfer to both front and back edges of the extruded shape.
items.name: SCNChamferMode.both

items.description: Apply a chamfer to only the front edge of the extruded shape.
